top_comment.text:
The #CClass has been lauded as one of the best small luxury sedans on the 
road. And the all-new 2015 #MercedesBenz C-Class is sleeker, smarter and 
sportier than ever before. Style and performance have never come together 
quite like this.

#Barrington   #LakeZurich  #BuffaloGrove﻿
top_comment.author: Motor Werks of Barrington – Mercedes-Benz

comments.author: LOLO Yang

captions.text: this is it
the all new c-class
its sleeker

it's smarter and its sportier than ever
before the mercedes-benz designers

took the C in a bold new direction
while still maintaining the brand DNA

the long sculpted hood trademark Patiala
the posterior design

combine it all with a lighter frame and
optional AMG inspired sport package and
it's clear to see

style and performance have never come
together quite like this

and inside that's even more impressive
the new C Class interior is simply the
best in its class

the aluminum trim vents the illuminated
dashboard the open pore black Ashwood

trim you can't make a move in here
without brushing against high end

appointments that go above and beyond what
the category usually offers

there's also more leg room especially in
back thanks to the new c-class is 3.7

inches of added length it's more than
just the look and feel

the new C Class interior also raises the
bar by lowering the volume
it's called and NVH. it stands for

noise vibration harshness and the
engineers brought those levels down to a
new industry low
it's one of the quietest interiors You'll
ever sit inside of and at center stage

is this gorgeous center console it
houses an intuitive touch pad that can

actually read your handwriting simply write
a letter

or symbol with their fingertips and
it appears as written text on the

multi-function widescreen display here
you can control
everything from music news and weather to vehicle diagnostics

financial stocks and status updates its
all at your command every
pinch swipe and zoom and speaking of zoom
this new c-class has one of the best

power to weight ratios in its class
giving it improved acceleration from a
standstill
and better passing power

two new engine options are each
controlled by speed-sensitive steering
that reacts to your slightest touch

I can feel the car respond to the road
as quickly

and intuitively as my own body does it's
really something you have to experience
for yourself

and with the new segment exclusive
aromatic suspension

you can switch from comfort to sport
mode with the simple

Press have the agility select button
there's even an individual setting

that lets you define your personal
preference

and all this Braun has backed by brains
starting with the brand new head up
display

which lets the driver to keep his eyes
focused on the road ahead and the new
c-class

comes with mercedes-benz intelligent
drive the latest in safety features

you've come to rely on for mercedes-benz
there's distronic plus
with steering assist which not only keeps the distance from the car in front

but can actually steer the vehicle back
in its lane when necessary

no other car in the segment has this
feature and standard

collision prevention assist plus a
radar-based system that can break
autonomously to avoid collisions

or reduce their severity a feature that
could only have come
from mercedes-benz let's face it

there are a lot of pluses to driving a car
with this many innovations
clearly the 2015 C-Class has

elevated its game in practically every
segment technology
performance especially value
all-powerful all dressed up
an all-new for mercedes-benz
